titleStmt.title: Honor military, and ciuill contained in foure bookes. Viz. 1. Iustice, and iurisdiction military. 2. Knighthood in generall, and particular. 3. Combats for life, and triumph. 4. Precedencie of great estates, and others.
titleStmt.author: Segar, William, Sir, d. 1633.
Rogers, William, b. ca. 1545, engraver.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Barker, printer to the Queenes most Excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: Of honour militarie and ciuil.
The 8 portraits are engraved by William Rogers, and have Latin inscriptions. Variant: portraits lack inscriptions.
Reproduction of the original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
